text:
Image: Ellen Pompeo in 2019 cropped from her photo with Jimmy Kimmel.jpg|thumb|Ellen Pompeo in 2008
Ellen Katherine Pompeo (November 10, 1969) is an American actress. She works mostly in television shows. She portrayed the character Meredith Grey in "Grey's Anatomy". She also does other television work. She was born in Massachusetts. She is excelent as Meredith Greys.
